name: TVTopShelfCarouselItem
desc: An item containing images, video, and other information that you want to display using a carousel-based interface.

items.name: var contextTitle: String?
items.desc: A localized string describing why the item is shown in the top shelf.

items.name: var summary: String?
items.desc: A descriptive summary of a movie or show.

items.name: var genre: String?
items.desc: The genre assigned to the movie or show.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The length of the movie or show, in seconds.

items.name: var creationDate: Date?
items.desc: The original release date of the content.

items.name: var cinemagraphURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL of a looping video to play, without sound, while the preview loads.

items.name: var previewVideoURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL for the content's trailer or preview.

items.name: var mediaOptions: TVTopShelfCarouselItem.MediaOptions
items.desc: Information about the media format and presentation options.

items.name: struct TVTopShelfCarouselItem.MediaOptions
items.desc: Constants indicating the item's audio and video capabilities.

items.name: var namedAttributes: [TVTopShelfNamedAttribute]
items.desc: Additional information to display for your content, such as a list of leading actors.

items.name: class TVTopShelfNamedAttribute
items.desc: An object you use to display additional information.
